title: German Officials Needle Trump at Munich Security Conference
summary_full: Friedrich Merz, the chancellor of Germany, said that under President Trump, the United States’ claim to global leadership “has been challenged, and possibly squandered.”
summary_public: Friedrich Merz, the chancellor of Germany, said that under President Trump, the United States’ claim to global leadership “has been challenged, and possibly squandered.”

DE.label: negative
DE.evidence: United States’ claim to global leadership “has been challenged, and possibly squandered.”
